description: bell flagon, in the form of a cylindrical flask with a fixed concave ring handle on lid which is fixed by device known as a bayonet catch; octagonal spout with hinged shield-shaped flap; escutcheon soldered on side of body bears initials H.H. and date 1793; tulip decoration in wriggled work around spout
markings: touches on top of spout flap; one shield with letter <Z> and scroll; the town mark for Zurich; between this and second, illegible, shield are maker\'s initials: <L.B.W.>
title: Bell-Flagon
